Uses of Package
com.opentok.android

Classes in com.opentok.android used by com.opentok.android
Connection
          The Connection object represents a connection to a TokBox session.
OpentokException
          Exceptions thrown by the OpenTok Android SDK.
OpentokException.Domain
          Defines error domains values for OpentokException objects.
OpentokException.ErrorCode
          Defines error code values for OpentokException objects.
Publisher
          A publisher captures an audio-video stream from the device's microphone and camera.
Publisher.Listener
          Monitors state changes in a Publisher object.
Session
          The first step in using the OpenTok Android SDK is to initialize a Session instance by calling the Session.newInstance() method.
Session.Listener
          Monitors state changes of a Session instance.
Stream
          Used to describe a stream bound to an OpenTok session.
Subscriber
          Consumes audio and video of a publisher in the OpenTok session.
Subscriber.Listener
          Monitors state changes of a Subscriber instance.
